name.baseName: Hot pressing / gluing / pressing paste ; Plywood, other wood-based panels (non-wood-based panels, engineered wood panels, plywood, reconstituted decorative wood, veneered wood panels, etc.) ; Adhesives (solvent-based) ; Shaping ; All sizes; NESPS2
热压/胶压/压贴 ; 胶合板、其他人造板（非木质人造板、细工木板、胶合木、重组装饰材、饰面人造板等） ; 胶粘剂（溶剂型） ; 定型 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of dust removal equipment (kWh) / (rated power of dust removal equipment (kW) × dust removal equipment operating time (hours))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of dust removal equipment (kWh) / (rated power of dust removal equipment (kW) × dust removal equipment operating time (hours))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本工业过程描述使用热压、胶贴和压贴技术制造各种木质基板产品，如胶合板、细工木板、重组装饰木和饰面木板。这些产品适用于建筑、家具制造和室内装饰。在所有规模的形状和粘合材料过程中使用溶剂型胶粘剂。管道末端处理技术用于管理生产过程中挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的排放，包括活性炭吸附、解吸、催化燃烧、蒸汽解吸、低温等离子、光解和直接排放。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码20,三级代码202.0文件，在完整版文件中第350页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为胶合板、其他人造板（非木质人造板、细工木板、胶合木、重组装饰材、饰面人造板等），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers (activated carbon fiber or zeolite adsorption/desorption/catalytic oxidation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是其他（活性炭纤维或沸石吸附/脱附/催化氧化），其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisActivated carbon adsorption/desorption catalytic combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of dust removal equipment (kWh) / (rated power of dust removal equipment (kW) × dust removal equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是活性炭吸附/脱附催化燃烧法，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸附/蒸汽解吸，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是低温等离子体，其效率为30，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotolysis，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management20，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是光解，其效率为20，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers (disposable activated carbon adsorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management6，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of process waste gas purification device (kWh) / (rated power of process waste gas purification device (kW) × process waste gas purification device operating time (hours))
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是其他（抛弃式活性炭吸附），其效率为6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisDirect discharge
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是直接排放，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/[设备额定功率（千瓦）×运行时间（小时/年）]。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of dust removal equipment (kWh) / (rated power of dust removal equipment (kW) × dust removal equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
